sentences.sContent: Good communication is vital in a large organization.
sentences.sCn: 在大机构里良好的沟通是极为重要的。

sentences.sContent: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication .
sentences.sCn: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.sContent: ...The organizers of the experiment concluded that far fewer students were achieving at high levels on critical thinking than they were doing for written communication or quantitative literacy...
...But then most of communication operates without being noticed...
...interpersonal communication through the internet is not restricted by space...
...communication through the internet could bring us both convenience and inconvenience...
...and lack communication with people around them...
...intercultural communication has become more and more frequent between Chinese and foreigners...
...It began as a military communication system...

phrases.pCn: 国际交流；国际通信；国际传播
跨文化交流；跨文化沟通；国际文化交流
人际沟通；人际传播；人际交流

words.tran: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的
通知者；报导者；领受圣餐者
交流；传播（communicate的现在分词）；传递

trans.tranCn: 通讯， 交流， 交际； 通信工具， 交通联系
trans.tranOther: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings
